---
title: "Bridged USDC"
description: USDC tokens bridged to Arthera
---

Several DeFi projects need a bridged USDC to operate, this is the official USDC.e token info :

- Token contract address on Arthera Mainnet: **[0x8C4aCd74Ff4385f3B7911432FA6787Aa14406f8B](https://explorer.arthera.net/token/0x8C4aCd74Ff4385f3B7911432FA6787Aa14406f8B?tab=contract)**
- Token contract address on Arthera Testnet: **[0x0a552eD9d121783FBbB291299Fd09663Ee02AeE9](https://explorer-test.arthera.net/token/0x0a552eD9d121783FBbB291299Fd09663Ee02AeE9)**
- Token symbol: **USDC.e**
- Token decimals: **6**

You can view the USDC.e token [contract source code and ABI on the explorer](https://explorer.arthera.net/token/0x8C4aCd74Ff4385f3B7911432FA6787Aa14406f8B?tab=contract).

:::info

_Latest update: [April 23, 2024](https://github.com/artheranet/arthera-docs/issues/103)_

:::
